translation.en: As time went on, however, the rulers' abuse of the other social classes led to social unrest and instability.

translation.ban: Ia madue bintang ring Hollywood Walk of Fame ring 1720 Vine Street.
translation.en: She has a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame at 1720 Vine Street.

translation.ban: Risampuné puput Perang Dunia I, Arsitek Eropa miwah Amerika rauh nyingakin tata wangunan sané polos pinaka pra lambang masa modern miwah gedung pencakar langit Art Deco pinaka pralambang panglimbakan, inovasi, miwah modernitas.
translation.en: Following the end of World War I, European and American architects came to see simplified design as the epitome of the modern era and Art Deco skyscrapers as symbolizing progress, innovation, and modernity.

translation.ban: Ri tatkala dané mapikayun pinaka aktor utawi sutradara ring studio raris ngamargiang parindikan sané kaon, dané raris mabaos sané patut indiké punika.
translation.en: When he thought an actor, director or studio had done something shoddy, he spoke up publicly about it.

translation.ban: Puniki pun sane zeno nyobak buktiang.
translation.en: This is just what Zeno sought to prove.

translation.ban: Panampén indik tumbukan ageng punika narka yéning kawéntenan logam saking Bulan punika prasida telas, indiké puniki ngawedarang genahnyane sané  nénten patut.
translation.en: The giant impact hypothesis predicts that the Moon was depleted of metallic material, explaining its abnormal composition.

translation.ban: ring warsa 1973, sujana biologi evolusi Theodosius Dobzhansky nyurat indik "nénten wénten sané tinglas ring tiosan ring pamargin evolusi sané sampun tatas," santukan dané maosang paiketan saking napi sané tan katon pinaka fakta sané kapasang olih sejarah alam raris dados pupulan widya sané makada tinglas sami nyihnayang saha narka akéh pisan pamargi indik fakta sané prasida kaselehin indik kawéntenan jagaté puniki.
translation.en: In 1973, evolutionary biologist Theodosius Dobzhansky penned that "nothing in biology makes sense except in the light of evolution," because it has brought to light the relations of what first seemed disjointed facts in natural history into a coherent explanatory body of knowledge that describes and predicts many observable facts about life on this planet.

translation.ban: Ipun pinih introvert ring Republik Weimar.
translation.en: They were very introverted in the Weimar Republic.

translation.ban: Rahina radite ane ngaenang liang ajak keluarga di tongos ane misi fasilitas ane  memadai lan harga ane mudah. Liburan ngaenang liang krana ada abian stoberi ane dadi alap langsunng uli abiane.
translation.en: Fun weekend with the family in a place with satisfactory facilities and affordable price. Our vacation became more fun with the strawberry grove where we can pick strawberries straight from the field.

translation.ban: Teori miwah observasi netepang kahanan punika mawinan pangarga pasar output miwah input produktif mamilih pangrencana input faktor antuk kautaman komparatif, punika ngawinang (relatif) input maprabéya alit prasida ngasilang output maprabéya alit.
translation.en: Theory and observation set out the conditions such that market prices of outputs and productive inputs select an allocation of factor inputs by comparative advantage, so that (relatively) low-cost inputs go to producing low-cost outputs.

translation.ban: Kepadatan és sané betenan saking toya wantah sangkaning akéhnyané molekul toya sané kidikan punika sané ngwentuk struktur kristal és, sané ngawinang akéh genah ring panaraning molekul toya punika.
translation.en: The lower density of ice compared to liquid water is due to the lower number of water molecules that form the crystal lattice structure of ice, which leaves a large amount of space between water molecules.

translation.ban: Arti pertama saking kata seni inggih punika <<cara ngalaksanayang>>.
translation.en: The first meaning of the word art is « way of doing ».

translation.ban: Kapertama kacoba sampun kasiagayang olih pelayan sane mayus sane ngranayang tiang mekelo kantos 4 gendingan marcell. Terus sampun mekelo nah nenten puput pesenanne. Nenten ngerambang rasane enak sakadi napi pelayanane jele terserah adane masih rasa.
translation.en: We tried eating here and we were immediately given a negligent server who made us wait forever, like 4 Marcell songs. It took so long that we decided not to order. They could have the tastiest food for all I care, but nothing could salvage that lousy service.

translation.ban: Georg von Peuerbach (1423–1461) miwah Regiomontanus (1436–1476) ngwantu makarya panglimbak astronomi banget pisan mabuat ring panglimbak model heliosentris Copernicus makudang-kudang dekade salanturnyané.
translation.en: Georg von Peuerbach (1423–1461) and Regiomontanus (1436–1476) helped make astronomical progress instrumental to Copernicus's development of the heliocentric model decades later.

translation.ban: Ngajeng ring sisin margi, ajenganne sing jaan, pelayanan sing luung, pengarga mael.
translation.en: Ate on the roadside, unappetising food, bad service, too expensive

translation.ban: Resto sederhana puniki ramai sajan pengunjungne, menu ajengan ne sane paling liu ka pesen be siap penyet sambel. Rasane jaen sesuai ajak rasan Indonesia.
translation.en: This simple resto is hella crowded with visitors, the most popular food menu ordered has to be its Ayam Penyet Sambal. The flavour is tasty and just right for an Indonesian's taste buds.

translation.ban: Karya-karya liyanan ring pamuput abad 19, 20, lan 21 sampun mamadukan disiplin ilmu lian antuk cara sane unik lan kreatif, sakadi seni patunjukkan.
translation.en: Other works in the late 19th, 20th and 21st centuries have fused other disciplines in unique and creative ways, such as performance art.

translation.ban: Ring entik-entikan, DNA sering kasisipang ngawigunayang pauwahan sane kamediasi Agrobacterium,  ngawigunayang paletan T-DNA Agrobacteriums sane  prasida nyelipang materi genetic sane kamargiang alami ring sel entik-entikan.
translation.en: In plants the DNA is often inserted using Agrobacterium-mediated transformation, taking advantage of the Agrobacteriums T-DNA sequence that allows natural insertion of genetic material into plant cells.

translation.ban: Pantaraning 95% saking materi urip kawangun antuk saking wantah nemnem elemen: karbon, hidrogen, nitrogen, oksigen, fosfor miwah belerang.
translation.en: About 95% of living matter is built upon only six elements: carbon, hydrogen, nitrogen, oxygen, phosphorus and sulfur.

translation.ban: Panglimbak panglimbak kawagedan manusané  sané  tiosan ring Afrika sampun nglimbak salami masa puniki.
translation.en: Other civilizations in Africa advanced during this period.

translation.ban: Kebebasan Kuno taler nénten sami polih ring krama sané akidik miwah homogen, sané dangan antuk kramané mapupul sinarengan ring génah sané pateh anggén mareraosan indik pikobet umum.
translation.en: Ancient Liberty was also limited to relatively small and homogenous societies, in which the people could be conveniently gathered together in one place to transact public affairs.

translation.ban: Jadma sané nénten polih paling kidik duang jamyadiastun sampun prasida nglintangin ajam ngaminggunénten pacang mapikolih napi.
translation.en: People who did not get at least two hours — even if they surpassed an hour per week — did not get the benefits.

translation.ban: Sajabaning antuk terminologi basa komputer, "fungsi" madue arti matematis sane lumrah ring ilmu komputer
translation.en: Except for computer-language terminology, "function" has the usual mathematical meaning in computer science.

translation.ban: Skil puniki sampun mawit sareng evolusi modernitas solah ring manusa kira - kira ring 50.000 taun sane pidan lan sesai kaanggep pininget majeng ring manusa.
translation.en: This ability arose with the evolution of behavioral modernity in humans around 50,000 years ago and is often thought to be unique to humans.

translation.ban: Gatrane punika prasida kapolahang antuk makudang kudang wangun pinaka pangudar miwah interpretasi pangidepnyane. (sekada gatra sane kapolaan  ring runutan sasawenan, utawi kawedar saking sigal).
translation.en: Information can be encoded into various forms for transmission and interpretation (for example, information may be encoded into a sequence of signs, or transmitted via a signal).

translation.ban: Bakteri ngawiwitin ngamedalang oksigen, ngwangun atmosfer bumi sané  katiga miwah atmosfer bumi sané  mangkin.
translation.en: Bacteria begin producing oxygen, shaping the third and current of Earth's atmospheres.

translation.ban: Ring pilem dokumenter punika, Coppola maosang indik rasa tangkejutnyané ri tatkala Brando sané  abotnyané kalintang medal ring lelampahan cerita antuk rasa pangrasa sané  kaon, raris nerusang antuk nyobyahang kawentenan Kurtz sané  madué  cihna kiris ring sajeroning angga sarirannyané nganutin lelampahan sané  asli, pinaka anak lanang sané  sampun ngalemin ragané padidi.
translation.en: In the documentary, Coppola talks about how astonished he was when an overweight Brando turned up for his scenes and, feeling desperate, decided to portray Kurtz, who appears emaciated in the original story, as a man who had indulged every aspect of himself.

translation.ban: Yening kosong nenten taen kejadian, dadosne algoritma polih majalan pinih akeh m − 1 tindak tanpa nganggen sisa lewih saking apisan.
translation.en: If 0 never occurs, then the algorithm can run at most m − 1 steps without using any remainder more than once.

translation.ban: Secara pamekas, ida ngebantah asumsi Konfusius dados sosok Bhatara lan kaanggep dados anak bijak sane paling ageng, kewala manusa lan fana kemanten.
translation.en: In particular, they refuted the assumption of Confucius as a godlike figure and considered him as the greatest sage, but simply a human and mortal.

translation.ban: Panadosné, struktur sareng organisasi internal sané pateh minbang pacang madué fungsi sané matiosan rin organisme inucap.
translation.en: Consequently, structures with similar internal organisation may have different functions in related organisms.

translation.ban: Papilihan miwah undagan karakter minab dados kunci sané kakaryanin mangda prasida dados pamargi identifikasi (kunci diagnostik) utawi mapaiketan sareng urutan alami utawi filetik taksa ring kunci sinoptik.
translation.en: The choice and sequence of the characters may be artificial in keys designed purely for identification (diagnostic keys) or more closely related to the natural or phyletic order of the taxa in synoptic keys.

translation.ban: Saliyanan Steamboat Bill, jr. (1928), film lantang fitur Keaton sane pinih tahan sue ngeranjing Our Hospitality (1923), The Navigator (1924), Sherlock jr. (1924), Seven Chances (1925), The Cameraman (1928), lan The General (1926).
translation.en: Aside from Steamboat Bill, Jr. (1928), Keaton's most enduring feature-length films include Our Hospitality (1923), The Navigator (1924), Sherlock Jr. (1924), Seven Chances (1925), The Cameraman (1928), and The General (1926).

translation.ban: Ampura, sing nomer tiyang gen ane keto, tiyang metakon mekejang ane nganggon di daerah ditu, ngorahang hal ane patuh, masih sing nyak ngaku amen mula sinyalne ane jele
translation.en: Excuse me, but it's not just my number experiencing that, I've asked everyone who uses it in that area, and they all said the same thing, still don't wanna admit that your signal is just that bad?

translation.ban: Mikroorganisme nenten  malih prasida  mepanakan taler ngalanturang patogen.
translation.en: Microorganisms can no longer proliferate and continue their malignant or pathogenic activities.

translation.ban: Ring makudang-kudang panegara , utaminnyané, pikobet ring widangan sains miwah agama sampun ngawinang kontroversi pakaryan-evolusi rahinané mangkin wicara agama sané untengnyané ring politik miwah pendidikan publik.
translation.en: In some countries, notably the United States, these tensions between science and religion have fuelled the current creation–evolution controversy, a religious conflict focusing on politics and public education.

translation.ban: Himpunan kombinasi linear integral sami saking a miwah b sujatiné pateh sareng himpunan kelipatan g sami (mg, m pinaka wilangan bulat).
translation.en: The set of all integral linear combinations of a and b is actually the same as the set of all multiples of g (mg, where m is an integer).

translation.ban: Genom prokariota wantah alit, tegep, miwah akéh rupanipun.
translation.en: The genomes of prokaryotes are small, compact, and diverse.

translation.ban: Kondisi lingkungan masih dados masuk pinaka faktor.
translation.en: Environmental conditions may also enter as factors.

translation.ban: Ring wacana, Descartes ngerawatang soroh tamba anyar sane prasida ngicen keabadian fisik miwah pikayunan sane sayan kukuh.
translation.en: In the Discourse, Descartes envisioned a new kind of medicine that could grant both physical immortality and stronger minds.

translation.ban: Indik bebaosan puniki, batu-batu gadang sané  sliab-slieb pinaka bukti subduksi salami Archean.
translation.en: For this reason, greenstones are sometimes seen as evidence for subduction during the Archean.

translation.ban: wantah asiki sané sampun kamargiang olih Maharaja Nero sané kanten pisan rikala pamargi ngrejeg Ethipia utawi Nubia:duk warsa 62 Masehi wénten kakalih legiun sané mlajahin indik tukad Nil.
translation.en: Only the one done by emperor Nero seemed to be a preparative for the conquest of Ethiopia or Nubia: in 62 AD two legionaries explored the sources of the Nile river.

translation.ban: Sekadi ane iraga tawang, brownies ane asli uli amerika sekadi punika jaja bantat ane mula warnane cokelat. Toko amanda ngae kreasi brownies ajak masakne ngukus. Brownies kukus ne tusing banget. Teksturne malah patuh ajak bolu biasa. Jadi menurut tiyang, ne tusing brownies.
translation.en: As we know, the original American brownies are baked cake that indeed has a brown color. Toko Amanda tried to be creative and made brownies by steaming them. And I have to say, these steamed brownies didn't do it for me. The texture was just the same as a regular sponge cake. So to me, these aren't brownies.

translation.ban: Kawéntenan biografi kuno sané  sampun ketah sakadi De Vita Caesarum ("On The Lives of the Caesars") olih Suétonius sané  kasurat sawetara warsa 121 M duk pamadegan Raja Hadrian.
translation.en: Another well-known collection of ancient biographies is De vita Caesarum ("On the Lives of the Caesars") by Suetonius, written about AD 121 in the time of the emperor Hadrian.

translation.ban: Lintang Geografis sepatutnyané kaanggén alonalon pisan.
translation.en: Geographic latitude must be used with care.

translation.ban: Diogenes saking Apolonia rauh saking monisme Milesian, sakewala ngajak pamikiran sane ngenah Elegan.
translation.en: Diogenes of Apollonia returned to Milesian monism, but with a rather more elegant thought.

translation.ban: Ye kene ketarang ngae indomie goreng jumbo padahal lamun besik ento dogen tusing ngranayang wareg
translation.en: He/She was caught making Jumbo-sized Indomie Goreng, even though just one of those won't be fulfilling.

translation.ban: Sane mangkin para antropolog Sosio budaya nguratiang samian elemem utawi baga puniki.
translation.en: Today socio-cultural anthropologists attend to all these elements.

translation.ban: Akeh filsafat masa kalihdasa miwah kalihdasa siki sampun wantah panyelehin basa miwah pitaken sakadi penampen Wittgenstein, akeh filsuf kantun paling indik kosakata sane kaanggen, ajahan sastra sampun nyelehin fitur retoris, asosiatif, miwah urutan basa; tur para narawidya sampun melajahin indik panglimbak basa saking dumun.
translation.en: A good deal of twentieth-century and twenty-first-century philosophy has been devoted to the analysis of language and to the question of whether, as Wittgenstein claimed, many of our philosophical confusions derive from the vocabulary we use; literary theory has explored the rhetorical, associative, and ordering features of language; and historical linguists have studied the development of languages across time.

translation.ban: Puniki ngepah eukariota dados nenem "supergrup" sané pateh.
translation.en: It divided the eukaryotes into the same six "supergroups".

translation.ban: Satusan umah ring medan merendem banjir
translation.en: Hundreds of houses in Medan were submerged by the flood

translation.ban: Manut ring masa sesampuné Perang Dunia II mamargi, panglimbak kawéntenan sané  ngawinang pamargin jet, satelit buatan antuk aplikasi sané  nénten keni antuk ngawilangin punika ngranjing ring Global Positioning System (GSP) miwah kawéntenan internet.
translation.en: In the decades after World War II, these advances led to jet travel, artificial satellites with innumerable applications including the Global Positioning System (GPS), and the Internet.

translation.ban: Ring warsa 1974, Swanson inggih punika silih sinunggil nerima panghargaan saking Telluride Film Festival pertama.
translation.en: In 1974, Swanson was one of the honorees of the first Telluride Film Festival.

translation.ban: Sakéwanten indiké punika sampan ical duaning dokumen utawi sesuratan punika kasurat ring naskah sakadi papyrus miwah kertas sané  gelis pisan rusak, sakéwanten nénten sakadi punika yéning ngangge batu.
translation.en: However, they have been lost, since documents written on materials like papyrus and paper deteriorated at a faster pace, unlike their stone tablet counterparts.

translation.ban: Poststrukturalisme sampun mikobetang indik ajahan humanistik madasar antuk pitaken indik artos, intensionalitas miwah kepengarangan.
translation.en: Poststructuralism has problematized an approach to the humanistic study based on questions of meaning, intentionality, and authorship.

translation.ban: Saranan apangrancana, tiosan ring sapunapi kawéntenan kotané punika, ngranjing taler modal investasi publik ring wewangunan miwah tata cara ngawigunayang tanah sekadi zonasi
translation.en: Planning tools, beyond the original design of the city itself, include public capital investment in infrastructure and land-use controls such as zoning.

translation.ban: Panyeleh raris ngamargiang analisis miwah narka data saking makudang-kudang metode statistik, kasarengin ring napi santé kabaos seseleh empiris.
translation.en: The researcher(s) then analyzes and interprets the data via a variety of statistical methods, engaging in what is known as empirical research.

translation.ban: Antuk akidik kuantitas, level nol manut kawéntenannyané kakepah saking samian level lianan, duaning antuk sané tiosan kirang langkung kapilih sakitannyané.
translation.en: For some quantities, the zero level is naturally distinguished from all other levels, whereas for others it is more or less arbitrarily chosen.

translation.ban: Mangdané prasida ngamargiang indiké punika, sejarawan sering pisan mawali malih ring paplajahan geografi.
translation.en: To do this, historians often turn to geography.

translation.ban: Bujur saking suatu titik polih katentuang antuk ngitung pabinayan galah embang titik punika ring tongosne lan galah Universal Terkoordinasi (UTC).
translation.en: Longitude at a point may be determined by calculating the time difference between that at its location and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

translation.ban: Ring pablibagan  duk Romawi, krama-krama Jerman taler kasambatang pinaka Germani utawi Jerman Kuni, yadiastun akeh parajana sane ngawedarang kakalih istilah punika kaon,santukan nyihnayang sapa sira angganyane sareng Jerman modern.
translation.en: In discussions of the Roman period, the Germanic peoples are sometimes referred to as Germani or ancient Germans, although many scholars consider the second term problematic, since it suggests identity with modern Germans.

translation.ban: Pinaka imba sané pinih dangan, kawéntenan ekonomi wantah prasida ngasilang produksi barang kakalih (minakadi "sanjata" utawi "mentega").
translation.en: In the simplest case an economy can produce just two goods (say "guns" and "butter").

translation.ban: Fungsi proposisional inggih punika basa sané ngambil entitas (ritepengan puniki, jaran) pinaka nganjingang miwah ngamedalang kasujatian semantik (inggih punika, proposisi sané kautus olih jaran sané mawarna barak).
translation.en: A propositional function is an operation of language that takes an entity (in this case, the horse) as an input and outputs a semantic fact (i.e., the proposition that is represented by "The horse is red").

translation.ban: Kaaptiang panglimbak nanoteknologi prasida ngawi konstruksin dane antuk makudang pemargi tiosan, minab ngawigunayang tata cara biomimetic.
translation.en: It is hoped that developments in nanotechnology will make possible their construction by some other means, perhaps using biomimetic principles.

translation.ban: Ngedegin. Soma semeng
translation.en: So annoying. Monday morning with heavy traffic and flood.

translation.ban: Ne indihome tiyang gangguan buin ne. Tiyang sedek ada gae nadak pegat, barak kedap-kedip, mara a minggu luung wifi ne, suba gangguan buin. Indihome telkom jani liu gangguan ao, mayah setata mael, mengecewakan sajan.
translation.en: My Indihome got some problems again. I was working when all of a sudden the connection was cut, my modem blinked red, the wifi had only been fine for a week, and then it got issues again. You've got a lot of problems lately huh, Indihome Telkom? Bill's always high, but still disappoints.

translation.ban: Sangkaning dedalihan puniki, eksperimen lapangan ring sapunapiné kasengguh madué validitas eksternal sané duurang ring eksperimen laboratorium.
translation.en: For this reason, field experiments are sometimes seen as having higher external validity than laboratory experiments.

translation.ban: Wah niki pateh sekadi tiang bli wawu, paket freedom I tiange durung telas nanging sampun keni tagihan tarif internet nganggen pulsa kirang langkung petang dasa tali tiang kasedot perampok.
translation.en: Oh I just had that too, man. My Freedom I package hasn't run out yet but I've been charged with internet fees. I need around 40 thousand credits to pay for that. What a robbery

translation.ban: Kabaosang indik angka sane kabutuhin  saakehnyane angka inggih punika kiasan kasar antuk logaritma lumrah, lan kaucap olih archimedes pinaka “urutan angka”.
translation.en: Speaking of a number as requiring so many figures is a rough allusion to common logarithm, and was referred to by Archimedes as the “order of a number”.

translation.ban: Untuk ngalih batagor ane otentik, ragane ten perlu joh-joh ngalihne ka pelosok, cukup arahin kendaraan ka margi uli djunjunan, iraga bisa menikmati bagaor asli ane jaan baan tongos ane nyaman. Rasa batagor ane kasajiang menggugah selera pesan krana batagor kasajiang garing-garingne buin siamine kuah kacang ane seger
translation.en: To find an authentic Batagor, you need not look to remote areas far away, just drive straight to the street on Djunjunan, and we may enjoy the tasty original Batagor with a comfortable place. Their batagor's flavour is really mouthwatering since it's served with the crisps and smothered in fresh peanut sauce.

translation.ban: Imba paripolah punika sekadi seka bogolan sane ngametuang modal sosial sane nincap, tios sekadi seka santi miwah seka bowling (santukan murdannyane asapunika sakadi Putnam nyeselin paturunannyane) ngametuang tata titi modal sosial pinih riin.
translation.en: Typical examples are that criminal gangs create bonding social capital, while choirs and bowling clubs (hence the title, as Putnam lamented their decline) create bridging social capital.

translation.ban: Afrika Tengah ngeniang embasnyane negara-negara sakadi Kerajaan Kongo.
translation.en: Central Africa saw the birth of several states, including the Kingdom of Kongo.

translation.ban: Pamuputnyané, sané panguntat puniki pinih mabuat anggén ngresepang  struktur kosmos sané kalintang ageng.
translation.en: Finally, the latter is important for the understanding of the large-scale structure of the cosmos.

translation.ban: Sekadi krama Munduruku ring wana Amazon nenten cumpu indik pawangunan dam Tapajós antun wantuan Greenpeace.
translation.en: For example the Munduruku people in the Amazon rainforest are opposing the building of Tapajós dam with the help of Greenpeace.

translation.ban: Durung mabukti sané cén sané iwang, nanging akéh sané ngugu yéning sané katarka kapertama nika sané patut miwah sané kakalih nika iwang.
translation.en: It has not been proven which one is false, but it is widely believed that the first conjecture is true and the second one is false.

translation.ban: Ahli bahasa tiosan taler sampun ngemargiang penelitian ring soroh  kontak basa, sekadi  bayan basa, miwah basa Inggris pinaka basa  lumrah ring jagate (basa global).
translation.en: Other linguists have carried out research in the areas of language contact, language endangerment, and 'English as a global language'.

translation.ban: Raktyat sampun med ningehang munyin pilitikus yaning becik kenapi tusing ngorahan becik. Kenapi sane polahange pemerintah. Mekejang tusing wenten sane becik.
translation.en: The people have had enough of politican's ramblings. If it's good, just say it's good. Why can't the government do anything right?

translation.en: The noodles are so similar to the original Mie Nursijan that no longer exists since the chef has passed away. The fried rice is also recommended.

translation.ban: Saraf sané medal saking otak kawastanin saraf kranial raris sané medal saking sumsum tulang belakang kawastanin saraf tulang belakang.
translation.en: Nerves that exit directly from the brain are called cranial nerves while those exiting from the spinal cord are called spinal nerves.

translation.ban: Miquel de Unamuno pinake kawiwiku sane kasub ring panguntat masa 19 miwah 20.
translation.en: Miguel de Unamuno was a noted novelist and philosopher of the late 19th and the 20th century.

translation.ban: Icalnyane tanah punika  ngawinang makudang pikobet sane kaarepin olih krama Adat Botswana, taler rumasuk indik San sane katundung  saking Central Kalahari Game Reserve.
translation.en: Loss of land is a major contributor to the problems facing Botswana's indigenous people, including especially the San's eviction from the Central Kalahari Game Reserve.

translation.ban: Otak ci nyatanne tuah amun guli.
translation.en: Turns out your brain is the size of a marble

translation.ban: makudang widang fisika mabuat pisan anggén mlajahin alam semesta.
translation.en: Various fields of physics are crucial to studying the universe.

translation.ban: Asane semeng ene macet sajan ao, suba tur di bus lebih uli a ajam, nanging tusing neked-neked masih.
translation.en: Looks like this morning's traffic jam was rough huh? We've been touring on the bus for over an hour, but we haven't arrived yet.

translation.en: You should try this diner with traditional aka old school concept a try. Aside from its great taste, this place also has plenty of unique traits such as the usage of enamel plates and drinking glasses from the old times. The menu has a lot of variety, and every single one is delicious!

translation.en: A greater percentage of whites (both non-Hispanic and, in some areas, Hispanic) and lesser percentage of citizens of other ethnic groups than in urban areas.

translation.ban: Pamargin gas ring peparu mamargi antuk makudang-kudang yuta kantong angin sané alit; ring mamalia miwah reptil puniki kawastanin alveoli, miwah ring burung kawastanin atrium.
translation.en: Gas exchange in the lungs occurs in millions of small air sacs; in mammals and reptiles these are called alveoli, and in birds they are known as atria.

translation.en: Christianity expanded in western Europe, and monasteries were founded.

translation.ban: Puniki kaperluang santukan akéhnyané panarka sané kakaryanin  olih teori-teori punika tan pawates, punika raris ipun nénten mresidayang kauningin saking akéhnyané bukti sané wantah nganggén logika deduktif.
translation.en: This is necessary because the number of predictions those theories make is infinite, which means that they cannot be known from the finite amount of evidence using deductive logic only.

translation.ban: Ring kahanané kadi puniki, studi observasional madué nilai santukan punika sering nyihnayang hipotesis sané prasida kauji antuk eksperimen acak utawi antuk mupulang  data anyar.
translation.en: In these situations, observational studies have value because they often suggest hypotheses that can be tested with randomized experiments or by collecting fresh data.

translation.en: But civilization is also spread by the technical, material and social dominance that civilization engenders.

translation.ban: Manut sistem puniki, soang-soang spesies nuénang kalih aran, asiki pinaka genusnyané miwah malih siki pinaka spesiesnyané.

translation.ban: Kantos mangkin, sakadi sané kabaosng olih Strachey ring sajeroning purwakaning piuning, biografi Victoria pateh sakadi "pangusungan layon", miwah pateh nyihnayang gaya barbarism sané  "alon ri tatkala pakuburan."

translation.en: It is well-supported by many independent strands of evidence, rather than a single foundation.

translation.en: Multiplication also combines two numbers into a single number, the product.

translation.en: My brother is watching Harry Potter on Trans TV

translation.ban: Ring widya botani purwa, mlajahin indik oong miwah alga sané kamargiang olih sujana mikologi miwah fikologi, widang paplajahan saking makatetiga kelompok punika kantun ngranjing ring lingsehan pamargi Kongres Botani Internasional.
translation.en: Traditionally, botany has also included the study of fungi and algae by mycologists and phycologists respectively, with the study of these three groups of organisms remaining within the sphere of interest of the International Botanical Congress.

translation.en: A World Map on a Regular Icosahedron by Gnomonic Projection."

translation.ban: Rikala organisme heterozigot ring satunggal gen, sering pisan asiki alel kasengguh dominan santukan kualitasnyané ngwasayang fenotipe organisme, raris alel tiosan kasengguh resesif santukan kualitasnyané rered taler nénten kaselehin.
translation.en: When organisms are heterozygous at a gene, often one allele is called dominant as its qualities dominate the phenotype of the organism, while the other allele is called recessive as its qualities recede and are not observed.

translation.ban: Para filsuf puniki nangkis indik, yéning kawéntenan mental inggih punika kamanahang material, nanging nénten parisolah, raris kawéntenan mental minab identik sareng kawéntenan internal pikayun.
translation.en: These philosophers reasoned that, if mental states are something material, but not behavioral, then mental states are probably identical to internal states of the brain.

translation.ban: Tracery praktis lan dekoratif, mawinan jendela wangunan Gothic sane ngancan gede ngabutuhang dukungan maksimal saking angin.
translation.en: Tracery is practical as well as decorative, because the increasingly large windows of Gothic buildings needed maximum support against the wind.

translation.ban: Friedrich Nietzsche marasa kapingon antuk pra-Socrates, nyebutang ida inggih punika atma tiran mantuk nandain antitesis ida lan preferensi nyane majeng ring Socrates lan penerus nyane.
translation.en: Friedrich Nietzsche admired the pre-Socratics deeply, calling them "tyrants of the spirit" to mark their antithesis and his preference against Socrates and his successors.

translation.ban: Pageseran gede saking arsitektur puniki taler sampun ngubah sekolah arsitektur antuk lewih fokus saking lingkungan.
translation.en: This major shift in architecture has also changed architecture schools to focus more on the environment.

translation.ban: kantos panguntating warsa 944, John K Wright kantun seneng ring Isogram, sakéwanten nénten nahenin kaanggén olih krama sané akéh.
translation.en: As late as 1944, John K. Wright still preferred isogram, but it never attained wide usage.

translation.ban: Restoran alas daun nyajiang ajengan khas sane ten doh melianan sareng restoran khas sunda lianan, nanging sane ngaryanang melianan nenten nganggen piring, lan wantah baanga don biu sane mapejang ring meja kaanggen penggantin piring. Dadosne meribang anak India sane ngajeng nganggen alas don biu.
translation.en: Alas Daun restaurant offers Sundanese traditional menu that doesn't really stand out among other Sundanese restaurants, but what makes them different is that they don't use any plates. Instead, they use banana leaves on top of the dining table as plates. It feels like Indian people, who actually eat food on top of banana leaves.

translation.ban: Panglimbak sangurdi miwah mantaya kuda sané  kokoh santukan jagi kabakta olih sang pamanah sané  jangkep masenjata ngawinang krama sané  ngumbara pinaka pikobet majeng ring panglimbak kawagedan manusané  sané  nyansan nincap.
translation.en: The development of the stirrup and the breeding of horses strong enough to carry a fully armed archer made the nomads a constant threat to the more settled civilizations.

translation.ban: Prasida ke anak dueg katlatarang ngawigunayang pesaratan sane saderhana  miwah ngawi angob ( sekadi pengrasa utawi rasa andel ring kayun )?
translation.en: Can intelligent behavior be described using simple, elegant principles (such as logic or optimization)?

translation.ban: Katahan entikan nonvaskular  wantah terestrial, antuk makudang-kudang sané maurip ring toya anyar miwah nénten wénten sané maurip ring segara.
translation.en: Most nonvascular plants are terrestrial, with a few living in freshwater environments and none living in the oceans.

translation.ban: Ajah-ajahan indik ekonomi kapanggihin ring makasami sasuratan saking pangawi Boeotian Hesiod miwah makudang-kudang sujana sejarah ekonomi sané nyihnayang Hesiod pinaka "sujana ekonomi sané kapertama".
translation.en: Economic precepts occur throughout the writings of the Boeotian poet Hesiod and several economic historians have described Hesiod himself as the "first economist".

translation.ban: Zoologi modern mawit saking Renaisans miwah pangawit priode modern antuk Carl Linnaeus, Antonie van Leeuwenhoek, Robert Hooke, Charles Darwin, Gregor Mendel miwah sané tiosan.

translation.ban: Peirce, Charles S. (1902), aplikasi Carnegie, cingakin MS L75.329330, saking Draft D of Memoir 27: "Punika mawinan, mangda manggihin wantah anggén mangda gelis indik kawéntenan pacang mamargi gelis utawi alon, yéning iraga nénten ngéwehang raga pacang makarya panyelehan punika.
translation.en: Peirce, Charles S. (1902), Carnegie application, see MS L75.329330, from Draft D of Memoir 27: "Consequently, to discover is simply to expedite an event that would occur sooner or later, if we had not troubled ourselves to make the discovery.

translation.ban: Tetujonnyane inggih punika ngewaliang ipun sane kasepekang sajeroning sistem ekonomi, mawali nuju "pawongan nyane."
translation.en: The goal is to reintegrate those marginalised from the rewards of the economic system into "the community."

translation.ban: Antropologi politik makembang dados displin sane mautama makaitan sareng politik ring masyarakat nenten wenten negara, perkembangan anyar punika kakawitin ring warsa 1960-an lan masih malangsung kanti mangkin: para antropolog wit mangkin ngeplajahin pangaturan sosial sane kompleks rikala kawentena negara, birokrasi, lan pasar macelep kakalih akun etnografi lan analisis fenomena lokal.
translation.en: Political anthropology developed as a discipline concerned primarily with politics in stateless societies, a new development started from the 1960s, and is still unfolding: anthropologists started increasingly to study more "complex" social settings in which the presence of states, bureaucracies and markets entered both ethnographic accounts and analysis of local phenomena.

translation.ban: Tiang sareng sameton kurenan tiang sedeng nelahang galah ring palembang. Tiang ngalih genah ngajeng lan kacunduk bakmi jogja puniki. Pas masuk tengkejut tiang krana musti ngalih tongos negak lan ngaliih tongos ane kosong tiang ten negak kanti 35 menit. Disampune mesen menu mi godok. Buin tiang ngantosang a jam lan puniki ngranayang tiang ilang selera ngajeng asapunika takenang e ka juru masak ne.
translation.en: Me and my wife's relative were spending time in Palembang. I looked for a place to eat and found Bakmi Jogya. When we got in, we were surprised, because we spent 35 minutes stranded while looking for an empty seat. After we ordered a mi godok, we had to wait for another hour and by then I've lost my appetite completely. I even asked the cook about my food.

translation.ban: Francis Bacon inggih punika filsuf ring abad ke 16 sane kakasub krana ngemajuang metode ilmiah, manawi niki filsuf kapertama ring era modern sane nganggen aksioma pra-Socrates secara ekstensif ring teks - teks nyane.

translation.en: It also proposes the three fundamental laws that architecture must obey, in order to be so considered: firmitas, utilitas, venustas, translated in the 17th century by Sir Henry Wotton into the English slogan firmness, commodity and delight (meaning structural adequacy, functional adequacy, and beauty).

translation.en: Moreover, Herder proposed a collective form of Bildung: "For Herder, Bildung was the totality of experiences that provide a coherent identity, and sense of common destiny, to a people."

translation.ban: Referensi diophantus sadurungne karembug manut lewih eksplisit olih ahli matematika India Brahmagupta, ring Brahmasphutasiddhanta ring warsa 628, sane nganggen wilangan negatif antuk ngasilin rumus kuadrat wangun lumrah sane enu kaanggen kantos mangkin.

translation.ban: Biokimia minab sampun ngawit néten ja sué sasampuné Big Bang, 13,8 miliar warsa sané sampun lintang, selami zaman layak huni rikala Alam Semesta wawu mayusa 10-17 yuta tiban.

translation.en: Because of their focus on textual study and interpretation, Mīmāṃsā also developed theories of philology and the philosophy of language which influenced other Indian schools.

translation.ban: Sampun lintangan ring duang abad, panglimbak saking teknologi komputer sampun ngawinang panglimbak ring Geomatika miwah pamargi anyar saking penyelehan miwah geostatistik sané karanjingan ring pakakas portofolio Geografi.
translation.en: Over the past two centuries, the advancements in technology with computers have led to the development of geomatics and new practices such as participant observation and geostatistics being incorporated into geography's portfolio of tools.

translation.en: An example of these disparate degrees of freedom is given by Allan Wallace who notes that it is "experientially apparent that one may be physically uncomfortable—for instance, while engaging in a strenuous physical workout—while mentally cheerful; conversely, one may be mentally distraught while experiencing physical comfort".

translation.ban: Manut sakadi pangawi biografo Bogart, Stefan Kanfer, indiké punika "wantah jalaran pamargin pilem noir nénten wenten cihna pabinayannyane".
translation.en: According to Bogart's biographer, Stefan Kanfer, it was "a production line film noir with no particular distinction".

translation.ban: Sampun tiang kirim sesuratan ne, diolas kasub ka cek.
translation.en: I have sent the direct message, please check it promptly.

translation.ban: Manut al-Maqriz, akéh jadma sané meneng irika ngega yéning kahanan bias sané ngangsan ngakéhang tur prasida ngangkebin Dataran Tinggi Giza punika pinaka walesan saking parisolah ngusak prarai al-Dahr.
translation.en: According to al-Maqrīzī, many people living in the area believed that the increased sand covering the Giza Plateau was retribution for al-Dahr's act of defacement.

translation.ban: Galah lokal (pinaka imba saking genah matanai), bervariasi manut kadi bujur, pabinayan 15° bujur manut ring pabinayaan ajam galah lokal.
translation.en: Local time (for example from the position of the sun) varies with longitude, a difference of 15° longitude corresponding to a one-hour difference in local time.

translation.ban: Para naturalis ngae Socrates sane alit lan ipun demen sareng ngalihin substansi kosmos, sakewala minat nyane makuang saat ida dadi fokus ring epistemologi, kedarman, lan etika tekening dunia alami.
translation.en: The naturalists impressed young Socrates and he was interested in the quest for the substance of the cosmos, but his interest waned as he became steadily more focused on epistemology, virtue, and ethics rather than the natural world.

translation.ban: Xenophanes kaloktah saantukan kritiknyané majeng ring antropomorfisme para dewa.
translation.en: Xenophanes is known for his critique of the anthropomorphism of gods.

translation.ban: Wastan anggén angka 0 ring basa Inggris luiré zero, nought (Inggris), naught (Amerika;), nil, utawi—ring konteks irika wénten asiki digit sané nampekin prasida masahang saking huruf "O"—oh utawi o.
translation.en: Names for the number 0 in English include zero, nought (UK), naught (US; ), nil, or—in contexts where at least one adjacent digit distinguishes it from the letter "O"—oh or o.

translation.ban: Newsweek ngayunin yéning pilem punika sakadi "cerita sané  ngranayang ludih indik patemonnyané", sakéwanten indiké punika mamargi becik ring box-office.
translation.en: Newsweek found the film a "dull tale of the meeting of the twain", but it was nevertheless a box-office success.

translation.ban: Tukad-tukad alitan prasida taler kasengguh antuk makudang-kudang aran minakadi pangkung, tlabah, aungan, tembuku, jlingjingan; tidak wénten tata titi sané prasida dados bantang napi sané prasida kasengguh tukad.
translation.en: Small rivers may also be called by several other names, including stream, creek, brook, rivulet, and rill; there is no general rule that defines what can be called a river.

translation.ban: Entikan ring darat sané madaging pembuluh lignin, polimer sané kaanggén ngokohang dinding sel sekunder trakeid miwah pembuluh xilem mangda nénten runtuh rikala jagi nyedot toya ring soring tekanan air.
translation.en: Vascular land plants make lignin, a polymer used to strengthen the secondary cell walls of xylem tracheids and vessels to keep them from collapsing when a plant sucks water through them under water stress.

translation.ban: Karakteristik sané nentuang saking makasami pengetahuan ilmiah, taler teori, inggih punika kawruhan rikala makarya panarka sané prasida  kapalsuang utawi prasida kauji.
translation.en: The defining characteristic of all scientific knowledge, including theories, is the ability to make falsifiable or testable predictions.

translation.ban: Seka sane nginutin soroh: ngawit saking budaya sane adung, sub-budaya, soroh, agama, tetamian sane sampun kacampuh, miwah budaya ring aab jagate mangkin.
translation.en: Identity-based Communities: range from the local clique, sub-culture, ethnic group, religious, multicultural or pluralistic civilisation, or the global community cultures of today.

translation.ban: Kolonialisasi Asia puput ring panguntating abad kaping -20, majalaran antuk pangremba saking nasional mangda prasida merdeka miwah prasisa nentuang nasib ngeraga ring sajebang benoa.
translation.en: The colonization of Asia was largely ended in the 20th century, with national drives for independence and self-determination across the continent.

translation.en: I'm about to flip my lid because of Indosat

translation.en: This applies for any cylindrical or pseudocylindrical projection in normal aspect.

translation.ban: Kota Thebes minabang nénten mabuat pisan sadurung Dinasti Kasolas miwah wangunan kuil irika kantun alit, sareng genah-genah suci sané kaanggén antuk dewa-dewa pangawit Thebes, Dewa Bumi Mut, miwah Montu.
translation.en: The city of Thebes does not appear to have been of great significance before the Eleventh Dynasty and previous temple building there would have been relatively small, with shrines being dedicated to the early deities of Thebes, the Earth goddess Mut and Montu.

translation.ban: Mawinan wantah angka kalih sawusan tongos desimal nenten katahanin, angka-angka selanturne nenten signifikan.
translation.en: Since not even the second digit after the decimal place is preserved, the following digits are not significant.

translation.ban: Vaksin sane madasar antuk vector tiosan sampun kacumpunin taler kantun akeh sane kantun kalimbakang.
translation.en: Other vector-based vaccines have already been approved and many more are being developed.

translation.ban: Sajeroning wawengkon internasional, Ben Fine (2001) miwah John Harriss (2001) sampun nungkas indike pengganggen modal sosial pinaka tamba pangentas (ngawedarang seka sipil miwah LSM, umpaminyane, pinaka ipun sane ngewangun) anggen ngentasin pikobet saking pawangunan ekonomi neoliberal.
translation.en: In international development, Ben Fine (2001) and John Harriss (2001) have been heavily critical of the inappropriate adoption of social capital as a supposed panacea (promoting civil society organisations and NGOs, for example, as agents of development) for the inequalities generated by neoliberal economic development.

translation.ban: Studi antuk genah lingkup sané  cupet mrasida ngawinang kirangnyané generalisasi, sané maartos napi sané kapolihang minabang nénten prasida kamargiang ring populasi utawi genah tiosan.
translation.en: Studies with a narrow scope can result in a lack of generalizability, meaning that the results may not be applicable to other populations or regions.

translation.ban: Proposisi sané kapikolihang antuk pamargi sané murni logis sayuwakti puyung ring paiketanné sareng kahanan sané kapanggih.
translation.en: Propositions arrived at by purely logical means are completely empty as regards reality.

translation.ban: Hippasus, sapunapiang, nenten kajunjung antuk utsahane: manut silih sinunggil legenda, ia ngaryanin patemonne dugas wenten ring pasih, lan selanturne kalempas ka pasih olih timpal-timpal gaene Pythagoras “... mawinan sampun ngasilin elemen ring jagat sane tidongin... doktrin wantah makasami fenomena ring jagate polih direduksi dados wilangan bulat lan rasione.”
translation.en: Hippasus, however, was not lauded for his efforts: according to one legend, he made his discovery while out at sea, and was subsequently thrown overboard by his fellow Pythagoreans “…for having produced an element in the universe which denied the…doctrine that all phenomena in the universe can be reduced to whole numbers and their ratios.”

translation.ban: Puniki kapuputang antuk panemuan fusi nuklir, sumber energi utama Matanai.
translation.en: This was resolved by the discovery of nuclear fusion, the main energy source of the Sun.

translation.ban: Wenten pabinayan ring  prarem GMO  sareng Negara, antuk makudang pabinayan sane pinih nyelab inggian AS miwah Eropa.
translation.en: There are differences in the regulation of GMOs between countries, with some of the most marked differences occurring between the US and Europe.

translation.ban: Upaminyané usulan Khawarij ring sasih-sasih pangawit babad islam indik Khilafa miwah Ummah, utawi usulan Islam Syiah indik konsep Imamah kamanahang pinaka bukti pemikiran politik.
translation.en: For example, the ideas of the Khawarij in the very early years of Islamic history on Khilafa and Ummah, or that of Shia Islam on the concept of Imamah are considered proofs of political thought.

translation.ban: Dané karasayang pinaka pangawit saking pra-Socrates saantukan dané mautsaha antuk muputang lelintihan jagaté miwah ngatur satua taler legenda tradisional sané sistematis.
translation.en: They are considered predecessors of the pre-Socratics since they seek to address the origin of the world and to organize traditional folklore and legends systematically.

translation.ban: Lingkungan genom minakadi biologi molekuler ring tengah sel, sel tiosan, individu tiosan, populasi, spesies, taler lingkungan abiotik.
translation.en: The environment of a genome includes the molecular biology in the cell, other cells, other individuals, populations, species, as well as the abiotic environment.

translation.ban: Secara umum, materi antuk ras puniki sampun kapindahan saking sifat permukaan ka genetika lan sejarah evolusi.
translation.en: In general, the material on race has moved from surface traits to genetics and evolutionary history.

translation.en: Bacteria are cheap, easy to grow, clonal, multiply quickly, relatively easy to transform and can be stored at -80 °C almost indefinitely.

translation.en: The first two are all prokaryotic microorganisms, or mostly single-celled organisms whose cells have a distorted or non-membrane bound nucleus.

translation.en: In addition to all of the other subdisciplines of geography, GIS specialists must understand computer science and database systems.

translation.en: In this usage, technology refers to tools and machines that may be used to solve real-world problems.

translation.en: In cartography, a contour line (often just called a "contour") joins points of equal elevation (height) above a given level, such as mean sea level.

translation.en: Spengler states civilization is the beginning of the decline of a culture as "the most external and artificial states of which a species of developed humanity is capable".

translation.ban: Scanning probe microscopy inggih punika cara sane pinih mabuat inggian ngenenin indik karakterisasi miwah sintesis  nanomaterial.
translation.en: Scanning probe microscopy is an important technique both for characterization and synthesis of nanomaterials.

translation.ban: Weierstrass, Cantor, and Heine base their theories on infinite series, while Dedekind founds his on the idea of a cut (Schnitt) in the system of all rational numbers, separating them into two groups having certain characteristic properties.
translation.en: Weierstrass, Cantor, and Heine base their theories on infinite series, while Dedekind founds his on the idea of a cut (Schnitt) in the system of all rational numbers, separating them into two groups having certain characteristic properties.

translation.ban: Para ahli teori puniki katunjang olih kalih pitakén dasar: asiki, madasar antuk hak utawi sané mabuat anggén ngwangun negara; miwah kalih, sapunapi wangun panegara sané pinih becik.
translation.en: These theorists were driven by two basic questions: one, by what right or need do people form states; and two, what the best form for a state could be.

translation.ban: Kecerdasan buatan (AI) inggih punika kecerdasan sané kacihnayang olih mesin, matiosan sareng kecerdasan alami sané kamedalang olih manusa utawi buron.
translation.en: Artificial intelligence (AI) is intelligence demonstrated by machines, as opposed to the natural intelligence displayed by humans or animals.

translation.ban: Ring matematika, persentase (saking basa Latin per centum "sareng satus") inggih punika angka utawi rasio sané kabaosang pinaka pecahan saking 100.
translation.en: In mathematics, a percentage (from Latin per centum "by a hundred") is a number or ratio expressed as a fraction of 100.

translation.en: Astronomers use two different definitions of magnitude: apparent magnitude and absolute magnitude.

translation.ban: Meta-riset nganinin indik déwék ipuné antuk deteksi bias, kakirangan metodologis, miwah kaiwangan saha inefisiensi tiosan.
translation.en: Meta-research concerns itself with the detection of bias, methodological flaws, and other errors and inefficiencies.

translation.en: In Neo-Darwinism, Richard Dawkins and other proponents of cultural replicator theories consider languages as populations of mind viruses.

translation.en: I wanted go to a hotel in Mong Kok, Hongkong, but turns out there was no hotel! Last June, I've booked and paid for 2 rooms. But the hotel was nowhere to be found.

translation.ban: Ring ekonomi mikro, puniki prasida dados jalaran rikala nentuang pangarga miwah output ring pasar antuk persaingan sané paripurna, sané ngingkupin kahanan rikala nénten wénten sané matumbasan utawi dagang sané maduwé modal ageng sané prasida netepang harga.
translation.en: In microeconomics, it applies to price and output determination for a market with perfect competition, which includes the condition of no buyers or sellers large enough to have price-setting power.

translation.ban: Yadiastun ngeragi puniki nenten akeh karesepang kantos karya Louis Pasteur  ring warsa 1857, puniki kantun kapertama ngawigunayang bioteknologi anggen nguwah sumber ajeng-ajengan dados  soroh sane tiosan.
translation.en: Although the process of fermentation was not fully understood until Louis Pasteur's work in 1857, it is still the first use of biotechnology to convert a food source into another form.

translation.ban: Yutaan sane pinaka warih Basque, (Suryanin Basque American miwah Basque Canadian) meneng ring Amerika Utara (Amerika Serikat; Kanada, utamanyane ring Provinsi Newfoundland miwah Quebec), Amerika Latin (ring 23 negara), Afrika Selatan, dan Australia.
translation.en: Millions of Basque descendants (see Basque American and Basque Canadian) live in North America (the United States; Canada, mainly in the provinces of Newfoundland and Quebec), Latin America (in all 23 countries), South Africa, and Australia.

translation.ban: Llyod lan Roach mapalas ring warsa 1924, lan Llyod dados produser independen ring filmne padidi.
translation.en: Lloyd and Roach parted ways in 1924, and Lloyd became the independent producer of his own films.

translation.ban: Sikut difraksi sinar-X DNA olih Florence Bell ring Ph.D. tesis (1939) mesib sareng (yadiastun nénten sabecik) "gambar 51", sakéwanten seseleh puniki kagulgul olih pamargin Perang Dunia II.
translation.en: X-ray diffraction patterns of DNA by Florence Bell in her Ph.D. thesis (1939) were similar to (although not as good as) "photo 51", but this research was interrupted by the events of World War II.

translation.ban: Puniki manawiang olih panglimbakan panopang makeber, sane matransfer daya dorong baat atap ka penyangga ring luar tembok.
translation.en: This was made possible by the development of the flying buttress, which transferred the thrust of the weight of the roof to the supports outside the walls.

translation.ban: Minab filsuf politik Eropa abad pertengahan sané paling ngicénin iusan inggih punika St. Thomas Aquinas sané ngewantu nyihnayang malih karya-karya Aristoteles sané wantah kakirimang ka Eropa Katolik liwat Spanyol sareng sané sinarengan ngicenin komentar -komentar Averroes.
translation.en: Perhaps the most influential political philosopher of medieval Europe was St. Thomas Aquinas who helped reintroduce Aristotle's works, which had only been transmitted to Catholic Europe through Muslim Spain, along with the commentaries of Averroes.

translation.ban: Menu favorit tiyang punika sup daging lan minumanne es cingcau selem. Rasane jaan, rekomendasi pesan.
translation.en: My favorite menu is the beef soup and iced grass jelly drink for the drink. Tastes delish, highly recommended

translation.ban: Abuah bola jagat faksimili sane nyinahang Amerika kakarya olih Martin Waldseemeueller saking warsa 1507.
translation.en: A facsimile globe showing America was made by Martin Waldseemueller in 1507.

translation.ban: Napi malih basa  saking dije witnyane  kedadosang bantang anggen masingsal, antuk wit Jermanik, Celtic miwah Lantin , taler Illyrian.
translation.en: Even the language from which it derives is a subject of dispute, with proposals of Germanic, Celtic, and Latin, and Illyrian origins.

translation.ban: Ring vertebrata, sistem saraf kawangun saking sistem saraf pusat (SSP), sané ngaranjing otak miwah sumsum tulang belakang, miwah sistem saraf tepi (PNS), sané ngranjing taler saraf pinaka pengubung SSP nuju soang-soang genah ring angga tiosan.
translation.en: In vertebrates, the nervous system consists of the central nervous system (CNS), which includes the brain and spinal cord, and the peripheral nervous system (PNS), which consists of nerves that connect the CNS to every other part of the body.

translation.ban: Raris ring warsa 1838, Schleiden miwah Schwann ngawitin nglimbakang pamineh sané universal nganinin indik (1) unit dasar organisme punika wantah sel miwah (2) sel saking individu madué soang-soang lintih kauripannyané, yadiastun ipun banget nénten satinut ring paminehé puniki indik (3) katah sel sané mawit saking sel punika sané nyibak raga.
translation.en: Then, in 1838, Schleiden and Schwann began promoting the now universal ideas that (1) the basic unit of organisms is the cell and (2) that individual cells have all the characteristics of life, although they opposed the idea that (3) all cells come from the division of other cells.

translation.ban: Bakteri punika kaaktifang mangda prasida ngawangun soroh prasida ngicen pemargi kawekas, nanging taler prasida nincapang pikobet utamananyane indik keamanan santukan pangius inggian bakteri miwah anggan manusane durung tatas kauningin yaning saihang ring tetamban tradisional.
translation.en: Enabling the bacteria to form a colony could provide a more long-term solution, but could also raise safety concerns as interactions between bacteria and the human body are less well understood than with traditional drugs.

translation.en: Scarcity is represented in the figure by people being willing but unable in the aggregate to consume beyond the PPF (such as at X) and by the negative slope of the curve.

translation.en: In Judaism, west is seen to be toward the Shekinah (presence) of God, as in Jewish history the Tabernacle and subsequent Jerusalem Temple faced east, with God's Presence in the Holy of Holies up the steps to the west.

translation.ban: Nanomaterial antuk transport ion sane gelis taler mapaiketan antuk nanoionik  miwah nanoelektronika.
translation.en: Nanomaterials with fast ion transport are related also to nanoionics and nanoelectronics.

translation.ban: Bumi lan benda angkasa liyanan lumrahne lewih becik kamodelin pinaka spheroid oblate, sane liyanan objek cenik sakadi asteroid sasai madue wangun sane nenten maaturan.

translation.ban: Inggih, lianan ring wisata wahana tiang masih demen wisata kuliner. ngawit tiang di bandung ajengan ane paling sesai alih tiang inggih punika siomay lan batagor. Miribang yening batagor tiang sampun akrab ajak batagor kingsley sane rasanyane melegenda. Indik urusan siomay, rasane nenten pelih yen wisatawanne nagingin waduk ipun ring saung siomay puniki. Sekadi murdane. Teksturne lembut, basane masih pas ngene pesan.
translation.en: Okay, aside from checking out theme parks, I also like culinary travels. Since coming to Bandung, the food I've been craving for are siomay and batagor. For batagor I'm already familiar with the legendary taste of Batagor Kingsley. But when it comes to siomay, I think travelers would love to treat their bellies in Saung Siomay. The title says it all, the texture is soft, and the sauce just hits the spot.

translation.ban: Mendel nyatet inggian selami puniki rikala ngwentuk gamet, alel ring soang-soang gen nyepih raga punika ngawinang soang-soang gamet wantah makta asiki alel ring asiki gen, sané kabaos ring hukum segregasinyané.

translation.ban: Pidabdab katalitik nanomaterial taler prasida dangan ngawi pikobet rikalaning mainteraksi sareng biomaterial.

translation.ban: Struktur DNA puniki wantah dasar fisik ring pewarisan: Replikasi DNA ngangkepang informasi genetik antuk nyibak untaian miwah ngawigunayang sabilang untai pinaka cetakan ring sintesis untai pasangan anyar.
translation.en: This structure of DNA is the physical basis for inheritance: DNA replication duplicates the genetic information by splitting the strands and using each strand as a template for synthesis of a new partner strand.

translation.ban: Rikala wentuk dasar kahuripan entik-entikan nglimbak, pamargin fotosintesis energi matanai prasida kapanen mangda prasida ngawinang kahanan sané ngawi pamargin kahuripan sané sayan kompleks.

translation.en: The locus of power in the West shifted to Constantinople and to the ascendant Islamic civilization with its major cities Baghdad, Cairo, and Córdoba.

translation.ban: Contonyané sekadi pseudogen, sisan-sisan mata sané nénten maguna ring bé sané buta sané maurip ring gua, kampid ring kedis sané nénten mresidayang makeber, tulang pinggul ring bé paus miwah lelipi, miwah cecirén seksual ring organisme sané mareproduksi saking reproduksi aseksual.
translation.en: Examples include pseudogenes, the non-functional remains of eyes in blind cave-dwelling fish, wings in flightless birds, the presence of hip bones in whales and snakes, and sexual traits in organisms that reproduce via asexual reproduction.

translation.ban: Anthropologi inggih punika studi ilmiah antuk rasa kamanusiaan, mekaitan ngajak sesolahan manusa, biologi manusa, budaya lan masyarakat, becik ring masa mangkin utawi masa pidan, ngecakup spesies manusa ring masa ipidan.
translation.en: Anthropology is the scientific study of humanity, concerned with human behavior, human biology, cultures and societies, in both the present and past, including past human species.

translation.ban: Mekanika kuantum: Ring mekanika kuantum, sané mapaiketan sareng parilaksana objek wantah alit pisan, nénten prasida pacang nyelehin sistem tan panguwah sistem, miwah "panyeleh" patut kaangkenin pinaka pahan saking sistem sané kaselehin.
translation.en: Quantum mechanics: In quantum mechanics, which deals with the behavior of very small objects, it is not possible to observe a system without changing the system, and the "observer" must be considered part of the system being observed.

translation.ban: Variasi ical rikala alel anyar ngantos titik fiksasi—duk ipun ical saking populasi utawi ngentosin makasami alel reraman ipun.
translation.en: Variation disappears when a new allele reaches the point of fixation—when it either disappears from the population or replaces the ancestral allele entirely.

translation.en: Been here a few times, but never got sick of its romantic, soothing atmosphere, feels like a personal resto. From the food to the service, everything's top notch. Highly recommended to visit here.

translation.ban: Rick Colwell, angga tim Deep Carbon Observatory saking Oregon State University, maosang ring BBC: "Titiang minehang minab prasida ngranjing ring papineh indik panarka ring soring permukaan planet tiosan miwah bulannyané prasida katongosin, utaminnyané santukan iraga samoun ngaksi indik organisme mamarga doh saking sunaran matanai ngawigunayang energi sané kasediang langsung saking wewatuan sané mawit doh ring betén tanah".
translation.en: Rick Colwell, a member of the Deep Carbon Observatory team from Oregon State University, told the BBC: "I think it’s probably reasonable to assume that the subsurface of other planets and their moons are habitable, especially since we’ve seen here on Earth that organisms can function far away from sunlight using the energy provided directly from the rocks deep underground".

translation.ban: Ngicalang emas miwah artefak ring bangbang ngawag olih ahli barang antik kolonial sané dumunan ngawinang kusakan ageng, utamanyané panyongcongan olih Richard Nicklin Hall.
translation.en: The removal of gold and artefacts in amateurist diggings by early colonial antiquarians caused widespread damage, notably diggings by Richard Nicklin Hall.

translation.ban: Astronomi ultraviolet pinih becik anggén mlajahin radiasi termal miwah garis emisi spektral saking bintang biru panas (bintang OB) sané banget galang ring pita gelombang puniki.
translation.en: Ultraviolet astronomy is best suited to the study of thermal radiation and spectral emission lines from hot blue stars (OB stars) that are very bright in this wave band.

translation.ban: Ekspresi stabil sampun kapolihang ring domba, bawi, bikul miwah buron tiosan.
translation.en: Stable expression has been accomplished in sheep, pigs, rats and other animals.

translation.ban: Fosil pangawit sané  madué  cecirin inggih punika jamur sané  mawit saking masa Paleoproterozoikum, sawetara 2,4 sané  lintang” organisme bentik multiseluler puniki madrue wangunan filament sané  prasida beranastomosis.
translation.en: The earliest fossils possessing features typical of fungi date to the Paleoproterozoic era, some 2.4 ago; these multicellular benthic organisms had filamentous structures capable of anastomosis.

translation.ban: Ayn Rand: Pamucuk Objekivisme miwah pamucuk gerakan Objektivis miwah Libertarian ring tengahing abad kaping kalih dasa ring Amerika.
translation.en: Ayn Rand: Founder of Objectivism and prime mover of the Objectivist and Libertarian movements in mid-twentieth-century America.

translation.en: Coordinates on a map are usually in terms northing N and easting E offsets relative to a specified origin.

translation.ban: Silih tunggil pikobet saking dumun ring Amerika Utara inggih punika kedis clepuk tutul utara sané kalindungin sané mahibridasi sareng kedis clepuk tutul California sané nénten kalindungin saha kedis clepuk sané katendadosang; puniki sampun ngawinang parebat ring widang hukum.
translation.en: One of the classic cases in North America is that of the protected northern spotted owl which hybridises with the unprotected California spotted owl and the barred owl; this has led to legal debates.

translation.en: During the period of political turmoil in the US that lasted from the outbreak of World War II in Europe until the attack on Pearl Harbor, she maintained an outspoken non-interventionist stance.

translation.ban: Astrobiologi, sadurungnyané kauningin pinaka eksobiologi, wantah widang ilmiah interdisipliner sané mlajahin wit, evolusi ring pangawit, distribusi, miwah masa depan kahuripan ring alam semesta.
translation.en: Astrobiology, formerly known as exobiology, is an interdisciplinary scientific field that studies the origins, early evolution, distribution, and future of life in the universe.

translation.ban: Cauchy (1821) kekeh saking tes konvergensi sane ketat, ia nyinahang wantah yening kalih deret konvergen, produk ipun durung sakadi kenten, lan antuk ia ngawitin patemon kriteria sane efektif.
translation.en: Cauchy (1821) insisted on strict tests of convergence; he showed that if two series are convergent their product is not necessarily so, and with him begins the discovery of effective criteria.

translation.ban: Iriki, semigrup kawangun olih wilangan asli miwah grup inggih punika grup aditif wilangan bulat.
translation.en: Here, the semigroup is formed by the natural numbers and the group is the additive group of integers.

translation.ban: Sané ketah ring buron inggih punika spesiasi alopatrik, sané kakantenang ring populasi sané pangawitnyané maisolasi sangkaning geografis, sekadi olih fragmentasi habitat utawi migrasi.
translation.en: The most common in animals is allopatric speciation, which occurs in populations initially isolated geographically, such as by habitat fragmentation or migration.

translation.ban: Ring bidang puniki, pikolih operasi matematika napi manten (penjumlahan, pengurangan, perkalian, utawi pembagian) kakirangin modulo 13; inggih punika, kelipatan 13 kawewehang utawi kakirangang nyantos pikolihnyané wénten ring pantaraning 0–12.
translation.en: In this field, the results of any mathematical operation (addition, subtraction, multiplication, or division) is reduced modulo 13; that is, multiples of 13 are added or subtracted until the result is brought within the range 0–12.

translation.ban: Duk Warsa 1980-an , buku buku sekadi Anthropology and the Colonial encounter  madaging indik  paiketan antropologi sareng nenten maimbangnyane kolonial,  nanging sane  kaloktah   para teoretisi sekadi Antonio Gramsci miwah Michel Foucault nyobyahang gatra gatra indik kekuasaan taler hegemoni sane dados panguratian.
translation.en: In the 1980s books like Anthropology and the Colonial Encounter pondered anthropology's ties to colonial inequality, while the immense popularity of theorists such as Antonio Gramsci and Michel Foucault moved issues of power and hegemony into the spotlight.

translation.ban: Pupulan peta inggih punika informasi geografis; koleksi ipun kagantung saking datum (model) bumi sane kapilih.

translation.en: Centuries later, Euclid's algorithm was discovered independently both in India and in China, primarily to solve Diophantine equations that arose in astronomy and making accurate calendars.

translation.ban: Woolard, nlantarang indik "alih kode", utawi praktik sistemis anggen ngantosin   ngentosin variasi linguistik ring sakancan pabligbagan kantos a  kruna, manggihang pitaken ngenenin sane keajuang olih para antropolog indik praktik punika - napi mawinan Dane ngelaksanayang punika?- akehan nyihnayang ideologi linguistik.
translation.en: Woolard, in her overview of "code switching", or the systematic practice of alternating linguistic varieties within a conversation or even a single utterance, finds the underlying question anthropologists ask of the practice—Why do they do that?—reflects a dominant linguistic ideology.

translation.en: Essence is the set of attributes that make an object what it fundamentally is and without which it loses its identity while accident is a property that the object has, without which the object can still retain its identity.

translation.en: While peasants of central Russia lived in a village around the lord's manor, a Cossack family often lived on its own farm, called khutor.
